quiz.question: culinary ____
quiz.explanation: 烹饪的, 烹饪艺术. He studied culinary arts at a prestigious school. 他在一所著名学校学习烹饪艺术。

quiz.question: _________ seminary
quiz.explanation: 神学院; 学院, 宗教神学院. He attended a religious seminary to become a priest. 他参加了宗教神学院成为牧师。

quiz.question: preliminary _____
quiz.explanation: 初步的; 预备的, 预赛. The team advanced past the preliminary round. 球队通过了预赛。

quiz.question: ________ luminary
quiz.explanation: 杰出人物; 名人, 行业名人. An industry luminary gave the keynote speech. 一位行业名人发表了主题演讲。

quiz.question: veterinary ______
quiz.explanation: 兽医的, 兽医诊所. Take your pet to the veterinary clinic. 把你的宠物带到兽医诊所。

quiz.question: visionary ______
quiz.explanation: 有远见的; 空想家, 有远见的领导者. The visionary leader transformed the company. 有远见的领导者改变了公司。

quiz.question: stationary ____
quiz.explanation: 静止的; 固定的, 固定自行车. She exercises on a stationary bike. 她在固定自行车上锻炼。

quiz.question: reactionary ______
quiz.explanation: 反动的; 保守的, 反动势力. Reactionary forces opposed the reforms. 反动势力反对改革。

quiz.question: _____ functionary
quiz.explanation: 公务员; 官员, 党务官员. The party functionary attended all meetings. 党务官员参加了所有会议。

quiz.question: discretionary ________
quiz.explanation: 自由支配的; 任意的, 可自由支配的开支. The budget includes discretionary spending. 预算包括可自由支配的开支。

quiz.question: cautionary ____
quiz.explanation: 警告的; 告诫的, 警世故事. The movie serves as a cautionary tale. 这部电影是一个警世故事。

quiz.question: hoary ______
quiz.explanation: 灰白的; 古老的, 古老的传说. The hoary legend has been told for centuries. 古老的传说已流传了几个世纪。

quiz.question: ______ itinerary
quiz.explanation: 旅行计划; 路线, 旅行行程. The travel itinerary includes five countries. 旅行行程包括五个国家。

quiz.question: ______ emissary
quiz.explanation: 使者; 密使, 秘密使者. A secret emissary delivered the message. 一位秘密使者传递了信息。

quiz.question: glossary _____
quiz.explanation: 术语表; 词汇表, 术语表术语. The glossary terms are defined at the back. 术语表术语在后面定义。

quiz.question: proprietary ________
quiz.explanation: 专有的; 私有的, 专有软件. The company uses proprietary software. 公司使用专有软件。

quiz.question: monetary ______
quiz.explanation: 货币的; 金融的, 货币政策. The central bank sets monetary policy. 中央银行制定货币政策。

quiz.question: hereditary _______
quiz.explanation: 遗传的; 世袭的, 遗传性疾病. Hemophilia is a hereditary disease. 血友病是遗传性疾病。

quiz.question: solitary ___________
quiz.explanation: 单独的; 孤独的, 单独监禁. The prisoner was placed in solitary confinement. 囚犯被单独监禁。

quiz.question: sanitary __________
quiz.explanation: 卫生的; 清洁的, 卫生条件. The restaurant maintains sanitary conditions. 餐厅保持卫生条件。

quiz.question: ________ dignitary
quiz.explanation: 显要人物; 高官, 来访显要. The visiting dignitary received a warm welcome. 来访显要受到热烈欢迎。

quiz.question: complementary ______
quiz.explanation: 互补的; 补充的, 互补色. Red and green are complementary colors. 红色和绿色是互补色。

quiz.question: rudimentary ______
quiz.explanation: 基本的; 初步的, 基本技能. He has only rudimentary skills in cooking. 他只有烹饪的基本技能。

quiz.question: alimentary _____
quiz.explanation: 营养的; 消化的, 消化道. The alimentary canal processes food. 消化道处理食物。

quiz.question: ______ commentary
quiz.explanation: 评论; 注释, 体育评论. The sports commentary was entertaining. 体育评论很有趣。

quiz.question: involuntary ______
quiz.explanation: 非自愿的; 无意识的, 非自愿抽搐. He had an involuntary twitch in his eye. 他的眼睛有非自愿抽搐。

quiz.question: votary __ ___
quiz.explanation: 信徒; 热心者, 艺术热心者. She is a devoted votary of art. 她是艺术的忠实热心者。

quiz.question: _____ tributary
quiz.explanation: 支流; 进贡国, 河流支流. The river tributary flows into the main stream. 河流支流流入主河道。

quiz.question: salutary ______
quiz.explanation: 有益的; 有用的, 有益的教训. The failure taught a salutary lesson. 失败教会了有益的教训。

quiz.question: ______ statuary
quiz.explanation: 雕像; 雕塑, 大理石雕像. The garden features marble statuary. 花园以大理石雕像为特色。

quiz.question: obituary ______
quiz.explanation: 讣告, 讣告通知. The obituary notice appeared in the newspaper. 讣告通知出现在报纸上。

quiz.question: mortuary _______
quiz.explanation: 太平间; 殡仪的, 殡葬科学. He studied mortuary science in college. 他在大学学习殡葬科学。

quiz.question: _____ estuary
quiz.explanation: 河口; 三角江, 河口. The river estuary meets the ocean. 河口与海洋汇合。

quiz.question: decry __________
quiz.explanation: 谴责; 公开反对, 谴责腐败. Politicians decry corruption publicly. 政客公开谴责腐败。

quiz.question: descry _ ____
quiz.explanation: 看见; 发现, 看见船帆. The lookout could descry a sail on the horizon. 瞭望员能看见地平线上的船帆。

quiz.question: ______ husbandry
quiz.explanation: 畜牧业; 农业, 现代畜牧业. Modern husbandry uses advanced technology. 现代畜牧业使用先进技术。

quiz.question: polyandry ________
quiz.explanation: 一妻多夫制, 一妻多夫制婚姻. Polyandry marriage is rare in most cultures. 一妻多夫制婚姻在大多数文化中很罕见。

quiz.question: sundry _____
quiz.explanation: 各种各样的; 杂项的, 杂项. The store sells sundry items. 商店出售杂项。

quiz.question: ____ wizardry
quiz.explanation: 魔法; 巫术, 高级魔法. The movie features high wizardry effects. 电影以高级魔法效果为特色。

quiz.question: tawdry _______
quiz.explanation: 俗丽的; 廉价而花哨的, 俗丽的珠宝. She wore tawdry jewelry that looked fake. 她戴着看起来假的俗丽珠宝。

quiz.question: _____ sorcery
quiz.explanation: 巫术; 魔法, 黑魔法. The villain practiced black sorcery. 恶棍修炼黑魔法。

quiz.question: leery __ _________
quiz.explanation: 警惕的; 猜疑的, 警惕陌生人. Parents teach children to be leery of strangers. 父母教孩子警惕陌生人。

quiz.question: peery ____
quiz.explanation: 窥视的; 好奇的, 窥视的眼睛. The detective had sharp peery eyes. 侦探有敏锐的窥视眼睛。

quiz.question: ___________ puffery
quiz.explanation: 吹捧; 夸大宣传, 广告吹捧. The advertising puffery was clearly exaggerated. 广告吹捧明显夸张。

quiz.question: ______ drudgery
quiz.explanation: 苦工; 单调乏味的工作, 办公室苦工. He hated the office drudgery of paperwork. 他讨厌文书工作的办公室苦工。

quiz.question: _________ skullduggery
quiz.explanation: 欺诈; 诡计, 政治诡计. The scandal revealed political skullduggery. 丑闻揭露了政治诡计。

quiz.question: forgery ______
quiz.explanation: 伪造; 伪造罪, 伪造罪. He was arrested on a forgery charge. 他因伪造罪被捕。

quiz.question: ____ periphery
quiz.explanation: 外围; 边缘, 城市外围. They live on the city periphery. 他们住在城市外围。

quiz.question: ________ fishery
quiz.explanation: 渔场; 渔业, 近海渔场. The offshore fishery provides jobs. 近海渔场提供就业机会。

quiz.question: _________ trickery
quiz.explanation: 欺骗; 诡计, 政治诡计. Voters are tired of political trickery. 选民厌倦了政治诡计。

quiz.question: _____ crockery
quiz.explanation: 陶器; 瓦器, 中国陶器. The china crockery was beautifully painted. 中国陶器绘制精美。

quiz.question: ____-_______ raillery
quiz.explanation: 善意的嘲弄; 打趣, 善意的打趣. Friends engaged in good-natured raillery. 朋友们进行善意的打趣。

quiz.question: _____ artillery
quiz.explanation: 火炮; 炮兵, 重炮. The army deployed heavy artillery. 军队部署了重炮。

quiz.question: ___ drollery
quiz.explanation: 滑稽; 诙谐, 冷幽默. His dry drollery amused the audience. 他的冷幽默逗乐了观众。

quiz.question: ______ cutlery
quiz.explanation: 餐具, 银餐具. The table was set with silver cutlery. 桌子上摆着银餐具。

quiz.question: _________ chicanery
quiz.explanation: 欺骗; 诡辩, 政治欺骗. The investigation uncovered political chicanery. 调查揭露了政治欺骗。

quiz.question: _______ finery
quiz.explanation: 华丽服饰; 装饰, 婚礼盛装. The bride wore beautiful wedding finery. 新娘穿着美丽的婚礼盛装。

quiz.question: ___ refinery
quiz.explanation: 精炼厂, 炼油厂. The oil refinery processes crude oil. 炼油厂加工原油。

quiz.question: _________ trumpery
quiz.explanation: 华而不实的东西; 废物, 毫无价值的华而不实之物. The shop sold worthless trumpery. 商店出售毫无价值的华而不实之物。

quiz.question: slippery _____
quiz.explanation: 滑的; 狡猾的, 滑坡. This is a slippery slope argument. 这是一个滑坡论证。

quiz.question: ____ cemetery
quiz.explanation: 墓地; 公墓, 城市公墓. The city cemetery is well maintained. 城市公墓维护良好。

quiz.question: ______ effrontery
quiz.explanation: 厚颜无耻, 厚颜无耻. His brazen effrontery shocked everyone. 他厚颜无耻震惊了所有人。

quiz.question: ________ artery
quiz.explanation: 动脉, 冠状动脉. Blockage in the coronary artery is dangerous. 冠状动脉堵塞很危险。

quiz.question: ________ monastery
quiz.explanation: 修道院, 佛教寺院. The Buddhist monastery sits atop the mountain. 佛教寺院坐落在山顶。

quiz.question: ________ lottery
quiz.explanation: 彩票; 抽签, 国家彩票. She bought a national lottery ticket. 她买了一张国家彩票。

quiz.question: ________ pottery
quiz.explanation: 陶器; 陶艺, 手工陶器. The shop sells handmade pottery. 商店出售手工陶器。

quiz.question: _____ query
quiz.explanation: 疑问; 询问, 现场询问. The journalist made a field query. 记者进行了现场询问。

quiz.question: ______ __ inquiry
quiz.explanation: 调查; 询问, 发起调查. Officials will launch an inquiry into the matter. 官员将对此事发起调查。

quiz.question: cavalry ______
quiz.explanation: 骑兵, 骑兵冲锋. The cavalry charge was decisive. 骑兵冲锋是决定性的。

quiz.question: ______ rivalry
quiz.explanation: 竞争; 对抗, 市场竞争. Market rivalry drives innovation. 市场竞争推动创新。

quiz.question: _____ revelry
quiz.explanation: 狂欢; 欢闹, 喧闹的狂欢. Noisy revelry continued until dawn. 喧闹的狂欢持续到黎明。

quiz.question: _____ allegory
quiz.explanation: 寓言; 讽喻, 道德寓言. The story is a moral allegory about greed. 这个故事是关于贪婪的道德寓言。

quiz.question: ______ pillory
quiz.explanation: 颈手枷; 示众, 公开示众. Critics put him in the public pillory. 批评者让他公开示众。

quiz.question: _______ armory
quiz.explanation: 军械库; 兵工厂, 武器库. The weapons armory stores military equipment. 武器库储存军事装备。

quiz.question: provisory ________
quiz.explanation: 临时的; 暂时的, 临时合同. They signed a provisory contract. 他们签署了临时合同。

quiz.question: compulsory _________
quiz.explanation: 强制的; 义务的, 义务教育. Compulsory education is required by law. 法律规定义务教育。

quiz.question: cursory ______
quiz.explanation: 粗略的; 草率的, 粗略的一瞥. He gave the document a cursory glance. 他对文件粗略地看了一眼。

quiz.question: _______ accessory
quiz.explanation: 附件; 配件, 时尚配件. She bought a fashion accessory to match her dress. 她买了一个时尚配件来搭配她的连衣裙。

quiz.question: illusory ____
quiz.explanation: 虚幻的; 错觉的, 虚幻的希望. The promise proved to be illusory hope. 承诺被证明是虚幻的希望。

quiz.question: mandatory _______
quiz.explanation: 强制的; 法定的, 强制性会议. Attendance at the mandatory meeting is required. 必须出席强制性会议。

quiz.question: obligatory ____
quiz.explanation: 义务的; 必须的, 义务职责. Military service is an obligatory duty. 服兵役是义务职责。

quiz.question: derogatory ______
quiz.explanation: 贬损的; 轻蔑的, 贬损的评论. He made a derogatory remark about her work. 他对她的工作做出了贬损的评论。

quiz.question: purgatory ____
quiz.explanation: 炼狱, 炼狱之火. Souls suffer in purgatory fire. 灵魂在炼狱之火中受苦。

quiz.question: nugatory _______
quiz.explanation: 无价值的; 无效的, 无价值的开支. The nugatory expense was a waste of money. 无价值的开支是浪费金钱。

quiz.question: conciliatory _______
quiz.explanation: 安抚的; 和解的, 和解的姿态. He made a conciliatory gesture to end the dispute. 他做出了和解的姿态来结束争端。

quiz.question: dilatory _______
quiz.explanation: 拖延的; 延误的, 拖延战术. The lawyer used dilatory tactics in court. 律师在法庭上使用拖延战术。

quiz.question: ambulatory _______
quiz.explanation: 能走动的; 流动的, 能走动的病人. The ambulatory patient can walk without assistance. 能走动的病人可以独立行走。

quiz.question: ______ signatory
quiz.explanation: 签署者; 签约国, 条约签署者. All treaty signatory nations must comply. 所有条约签署国必须遵守。

quiz.question: minatory ____
quiz.explanation: 威胁的; 恐吓的, 威胁的语气. He spoke in a minatory tone. 他用威胁的语气说话。

quiz.question: discriminatory ________
quiz.explanation: 歧视性的, 歧视性做法. The discriminatory practice was ruled illegal. 歧视性做法被裁定为非法。

quiz.question: anticipatory ____
quiz.explanation: 预期的; 先发的, 预期保释. The court granted anticipatory bail. 法院批准了预期保释。

quiz.question: migratory _____
quiz.explanation: 迁徙的; 流动的, 候鸟. Migratory birds fly south for winter. 候鸟为过冬飞往南方。

quiz.question: ________ oratory
quiz.explanation: 演讲术; 雄辩, 有力的演讲. His powerful oratory moved the audience. 他有力的演讲打动了观众。

quiz.question: compensatory _______
quiz.explanation: 补偿的; 赔偿的, 赔偿金. The court awarded compensatory damages. 法院裁定赔偿金。

quiz.question: gustatory _________
quiz.explanation: 味觉的, 味觉感受器. Gustatory receptors detect flavors. 味觉感受器检测味道。

quiz.question: _____ observatory
quiz.explanation: 天文台; 观测站, 太空观测站. The space observatory monitors distant galaxies. 太空观测站监测遥远的星系。

quiz.question: _____ conservatory
quiz.explanation: 温室; 音乐学院, 玻璃温室. The glass conservatory houses tropical plants. 玻璃温室容纳热带植物。

quiz.question: olfactory _____
quiz.explanation: 嗅觉的, 嗅神经. The olfactory nerve detects smells. 嗅神经检测气味。

quiz.question: refractory _____
quiz.explanation: 难熔的; 倔强的, 难熔金属. Refractory metal withstands high temperatures. 难熔金属耐高温。

quiz.question: _______ refectory
quiz.explanation: 食堂; 餐厅, 大学食堂. Students eat in the college refectory. 学生在大学食堂吃饭。
